channel.title: [Pi] object help [Pi]

item.title: [Pi] object help [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Okay guys. So I’m not sure if this belongs in the models section, or here. But I’ll just try here anyways. So I have this incredibly made boxing arena that one of my friends made me (not sure if they want me to say their name or not) but whenever I add it, it looks glitchy when I move around. I think it is a priority problem but I’m not sure. This is what the problem looks like.

Here is what i have in objectDef.

if (i == 6200) { objectDef.name = "Boxing Ring"; objectDef.description = "Fight in hand to hand combat.".getBytes(); objectDef.anIntArray773 = new int[1]; objectDef.anIntArray773[0] = 62000; objectDef.hasActions = true; //objectDef.actions[1] = "Climb"; }

What do I do to fix this?

Read full topic
